content: Planting suitable trees in your backyard or community green spaces is a great way to provide habitat for koalas and other wildlife. If you're interested in doing so, it's important to choose the right types of trees - this will vary depending on your location and the local climate. You may want to consult with a local nursery or conservation organization to get advice on the best types of trees and plants to plant in your area. Good luck and thank you for doing your part in koala conservation!
